properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 12:07PM CST until January 11 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Wichita KS
properties.description:
...Winter Weather to impact the area this afternoon through
Saturday...

* WHAT...Wintry mixed precipitation expected. Total snow
accumulations of one to two inches and ice accumulations of one
quarter to one half inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Harvey County.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM CST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Trees, power lines
and elevated surfaces will rapidly become ice covered.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wintry precipitation will begin as freezing
rain this evening and change over to snow by Saturday morning.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST SATURDAY
